website_summaries.verdict: A little bit of luxury goes a long way to improve hair, skin and nails literally overnight.
pros: Multiple reviews claim miracle-like capabilities such as reducing blemishes, wrinkles and split ends
We love that it's beneficial to both men and women
Doesn't just sooth skin, but has calming effects as well
Appreciated by those who make their own oils
cons: Do not expect this oil to heal multiple skin conditions at once

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!!!! DON’T DO ITTTTT
customer_reviews.text: Omgggg STAY AWAY!!!! This rancid jojoba oil burnt my face sooo bad!! Like my pics don’t even do it justice!! I woke up with red, inflamed, bubbled-up skin! I had perfectly CLEAR skin and decided to use this as my nighttime moisturizer (bc I didn’t have my normal moisturizer on hand) and woke up a burn victim!!! I had to get burn cream from my Dr and have been slathered up for a whole week but it’s still not healed! My whole face is thick like a scab now especially that paper thin skin around my eyes. FML!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Fine

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this oil for my face. While applying the oil I would get it on my lips and hands. My lips were chapped for at least a month. I tried 6 different chapsticks with no results. This oil is the only thing to help my lips. I have had severe eczema on my hands for as long as I can remember, but this cured it. It has been ridiculously cold and my hands were cracked and bleeding constantly. I started putting this oil on twice a day and 2 weeks later my hands look perfect.
customer_reviews.author: tcm

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have a reaction to Jojoba oil until trying this brand.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this oil. I loved another jojoba oil so was very excited to try this one. My skin is not normally sensitive to skin care products, but used this oil before bed and woke up with a very intense rash all over my face neck and hands. This reaction did not go away for about 5 days.. jojoba oil in the past had done wonders for my skin, and with this one did the opposite. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Kirby

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF STINKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand because I thought it would be better since it is in a glass container. I was recomended jojoba oil for my cuticles by a nail technician. This stuff literally smells like those little weenies that you roast on holidays, or fancy parties. I saw other comments also mentioning a “hot dog” scent to them. It SMELLS AWFUL! I didnt get an allergic reaction to it, but I also didnt put this on my face. One star rating because it is suppose to have a “light” or “mild” scent according to the 5 star reviews..... those are some shady reviwers, cause this stuff stinks and the stink lingers. Furthermore, the seller does not allow return. Very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I love this product because it’s so inexpensive and does wonders
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it’s so inexpensive and does wonders. Every time I take a shower I add a few drops to the ends of my hair and add my regular conditioner. I’ll put my hair in a bun and wash my body. It’s almost like doing a deep conditioning treatment every time I shower. Although it may be different for others my hair is very thick! This oil helps keep my hair from spot ends and keeps it soft.
customer_reviews.author: Margaux

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier for the rellief
customer_reviews.text: I have Psoriasis on scalp and ears and this has helped immensely. When Joico came out with their Jojoba shampoo,(this was back 30 years ago) their big claim was that it helped regrow thinning hair, which it did, so I am hoping it will also help mine as it eliminates the psoriasis.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for nails
customer_reviews.text: Best oil for nails and dry skin! I used to pick at the skin around my fingers to the point of bleeding on a regular basis. It was so nasty, but i combined this oil 60%with vitamin e oil and a few drops of lavender and lemon essential oil to create my own nail oil and the results are fantastic! Also I have acne, but I can use this oil on my face without breaking out. Best oil!
customer_reviews.author: kelly bird

customer_reviews.title: I use jojoba oil to remove eye makeup (for years) ...
customer_reviews.text: I use jojoba oil to remove eye makeup (for years) and I've never had an issue with any brands. After using this brand for about a month I noticed my eyes were getting irritated for a few days. Then one night when I went to go wash my makeup off I noticed that there was this weird film that had particles and who knows what else in it in the oil. I thought it was maybe just dust that I had gotten on my hands prior to pouring the oil but I looked in the bottle and there was a TON of this gross stuff. Will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Lareau

customer_reviews.title: Moldy Oil
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE My oil arrived molding. I put it on my face without realizing what what inside it. I’m absolutely horrified and my skin is burning. I have included pictures of the mold floating in the oil. The worst thing is, the oil doesn’t even smell rancid so there was no way to tell that it had mold growing in it. I am disgusted and disappointed in this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for skin and hair
customer_reviews.text: I first used this as a carrier oil for a few essential oils that I use as natural cologne. The real breakthrough for me was using it on my hair. I suffered from seborrheic dermatitis for YEARS and tried all sorts of different shampoos to cure it. Now I just put a quarter-sized dollop of this oil in my palm and rub it in while my hair is hot and wet after a shower, and my horrendous flakes are GONE. I think it works because it mimics your body's own natural sebum, which finally got my pores to slow down their greasy production, finally stopping the seborrheic dermatitis symptoms. Absolutely worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: M. W. Malecky

customer_reviews.title: Thick, lush oil!
customer_reviews.text: I really do like it. It is thicker than I have seen in jojoba, and my hair changed instantly when I applied it, as did my skin. Moisturized and glowy are the words I would use to describe my face and hair. Cruelty free, vegan, organic, cold pressed. My new fave jojoba!
customer_reviews.author: Moselle

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase had a disgusting smell
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this product, it was amazing! My skin stayed clear and bright. I recently ran out and ordered a bigger one from their website (which they have the on bottle with a code) and it smells absolutely disgusting. It has a weird chemical odor that makes me.feel real uncomfortable to put on my face. I see others have had this issue recently too and I'm pretty disappointed. Thought it was gonna be a staple in skincare but not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: C2

customer_reviews.title: Essential oils are toxic to cats.  Advertising should state that.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this a one star because it does not state in the ad posted on this website or on the bottle label to keep away from children AND pets. My cat was exposed to this and lavender essential oil. He passed away within two weeks after his nervous system shut down. He started out with the sniffles and was given fluids to flush out toxins but to no avail. I found out from the vet and the ASPCA website after he was exposed that essential oils contain toxins that cats lack enzymes to metabolize, and the toxins accumulate in the body.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen S

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to give it try and got a bad reaction and red rashes due to it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using jojoba oil of a different brand. Bought this to give it try and got a bad reaction and red rashes due to it.
customer_reviews.author: Manasi

customer_reviews.title: Must try!!! I will be back for more 😁
customer_reviews.text: On the first use it worked great for under eye wrinkles it literally smooth them out I can’t wait to continue using this jojoba oil hopefully the little wrinkles an lines will stay way permanently
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Great for my hair!
customer_reviews.text: This oil has worked really good in my hair and won’t leave my scalp oily. I put it on b4 I wash my hair, not every time but once a week. As far as hair growth , I haven’t seen results yet, but it leaves my hair really soft. I massage my scalp with my head tilted down for about 5 minutes and then apply some on the ends, then put a plastic shower cap so it stays warm. I see best results in softness and shine the longer I leave it on. It doesn’t have much of a scent. I give it 5 stars bc it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: PQueen35

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin youthful and glowing.
customer_reviews.text: My skin loves this oil. Only takes 1 drop on each side of face and 1 drop on neck while skin is still damp. Everyone tells me my skin looks 15 years younger than I am. I then use mineral sunscreen .
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I have terrible dermatitis so finding something that ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have terrible dermatitis so finding something that doesn't cause additional irritation, inflammation is a good thing. This seems to be gentle, provides some moisture and does not cause irritation. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Birdy

customer_reviews.title: Picture is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: One of the reasons I bought this product is because the picture clearly shows it has a dropper. No dropper with mine! Very disappointing, and this is not something I have laying around, so I have to go buy it before I can use it. Truth in advertising...
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: Used for my beard, works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically for use in my beard as I was starting to notice some flaky/dry skin. After using it consistently for a week, I already can see improvements to my skin! I have a pretty large beard (think somewhere between cave man and sea captain but not long enough to be a wizard) so I use about 10 drops of oil and work it into the skin after my morning shower everyday. Since Jojoba oil is very close to the oil that your skin naturally produces, it doesn't clog your pores. There's not any offensive scents to the oil either which is great because I have sensitive skin that reacts to perfumes. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Passow

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast, but glass dropper broken
customer_reviews.text: Points for coming fast. But as I opened this product, I heard a strange rattling. Inside, I discovered the dropper was broken in several pieces, although the shipping envelope and manufacturers box was intact. Glass crumbs sprinkled all over my floor, where my 1 and 4-year-old kids crawl/walk. Which is obviously a safety issue. And a huge bummer as I was looking forward to using my new face oil.
customer_reviews.author: AKMama

customer_reviews.title: bad container, oil went rancid
customer_reviews.text: This product was great for a while, but I quickly became wary of the dropper design. Pure oils like this are highly sensitive to oxidation from air and light, which I didn't fully appreciate before I bought it. The dropper lid didn't seal the bottle from the air and the oil quickly spoiled. Now it has a funky smell. DO NOT use rancid oil on your face or it will worsen the oxidation in your skin! I still have 4/5 of the container left, what a waste of oil. Will not be buying this oil again, or any oil with a dropper for that matter!!! Need something resealable and more convenient!
customer_reviews.author: mak2yak

customer_reviews.title: Makes your hair soft.
customer_reviews.text: The oil works great for my hair, making it soft, shiny, and decreasing the frizz. It does tend to pull some of the curl out after a couple of days, but if you are a daily hair washer you won't have to worry about this. It has a light feel and almost no smell which I love because it makes it great to use as a carrier oil for essential oils. It feels light on the skin, doesn't absorb very quickly but when it does it doesn't feel greasy and gross. Love the dropper, it makes it much easier to get exactly how much you need.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna W.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered some sweet almond oil (different brand) along with this
customer_reviews.text: The wife ordered this and is leaving this review. Presenting "the wife": Hello all! I ordered some sweet almond oil (different brand) along with this. This is thicker than the almond oil. But at the rate I'm going through it I would like it to come in a larger container. I don't know about it performing any miracles like getting rid of wrinkles or sun spots, but it does seem to keep my skin more smooth and moisturized all day without my clothes absorbing it. Bottom line: Me Likey!
customer_reviews.author: Abides

customer_reviews.title: Smell?
customer_reviews.text: After a few months it has kinda gotten a smell that it didnt have when I opened the package. I wash my hands before I touch the dropped every time to not spread bacteria so I dont know if it's that theres bacteria in there now or what. I have since stopped using it. It was very nice for my stretched ears and scaley dry elbows before bed
customer_reviews.author: K10

customer_reviews.title: STINKS
customer_reviews.text: I'd say I have a pretty strong sense of smell but am not sensitive to many smells. Sadly I agree with other reviewers who said theirs smelled terrible. I'm not sure how to even describe it but it's disgusting and I couldn't even think about applying to my face! Jojoba oil is supposed to be virtually odorless and if it has any smell it is described as "slightly nutty" if anything...this was not that smell at ALL. Someone described it as hotdogs in their review and I'd have to say that's pretty close to the gross smell of it. No thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cludwig102

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - broken glass, old product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!! The bottle is all scratched up and is expired. The glass pipette is broken with pieces of broken glass all in the package. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Growth in bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the oil cleansing method for a few years now. This is the second brand I have purchase, and the first to have issues with. I first began noticing very thin/small/light stuff in the dropper when I went to use it. Maybe 1/3 of the bottle is when I started noticing it. It began to thicken up and darken over a week or so. I could then see stuff floating in the bottom of the bottle. Here’s the pictures I took. I didn’t have a single issue from the first brand. I will not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this as a stand alone moisturizer, but it wasn’t thick enough. Instead I have been mixing a tiny bit with my face wash and I also use a smidge with my foundation. I have to say, my skin has never looked better. I’m 40 years old, I have extreme dry, sensitive skin with roseacea, and this has done wonders for me. I have a dewy glow to my skin and it’s extreme gentle. I have used high quality facial cleaners, moisturizers, etc for many years and this stuff is the real deal. Cannot best it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Schamy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely oil
customer_reviews.text: I had heard of Jojoba oil before, but never used it. An online makeup artist recommended it to smooth out dried or caked-on makeup. I bought this oil (cheaper than her product) and love it. The oil is like silk, goes easily into the skin, doesn't have that oily feel to it, and can be used as a moisturizer or as she recommended. Definitely will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bijou13

customer_reviews.title: Too cold for oil...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what rating I should give it because the oil might be good it's just that it was delivered in the winter with no note to say there was oil in it so the driver who was delivering it would know not to leave it out in the cold it's froze and I've lost most of my oil. It would have been nice if the package was held or there was a note on the package to let the delivery person know that there was glass in the box with oil
customer_reviews.author: Cooking in NJ

customer_reviews.title: I switched my moisturizer for this. You don't need ...
customer_reviews.text: I switched my moisturizer for this. You don't need to use a carrier oil with this oil. I drop 3 times on my face after washing it. In the morning and night. Makes skin soft. takes a while to dry, might need to pat afterward if you decide to put makeup on after washing face.
customer_reviews.author: Neah

customer_reviews.title: maybe even better than on my normal
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just as described. I've been using it on my hands, which flare up with eczema every now and then. Not wanting to use the steroid cream usually required for flare ups I tried this and holy moly did it work wonders. Within two days my skin was almost back to normal, maybe even better than on my normal, medicated regimen. This stuff is truly amazing and it dries in so well and feels so smooth, not slippery at all. I would absolutely recommend this to anyone with eczema, my skin is so much happier and healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my skin especially on my face has been extra dry this winter. I decided to combine this jojoba oil with a maracuja oil and it has worked wonders. The jojoba oil I can tell is especially helping with my dryness. I no longer feel like my skin is tight, and it leaves my skin feeling so incredibly soft by the next day. I'm also prone to breakouts but so far this has not contributed to any breakouts. And combined with the maracuja oil it has reduced the redness of any existing pimples and seems to heal them faster. Overall I love it
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Terry

customer_reviews.title: Dropper came broken
customer_reviews.text: My eye dropper came broken so I don’t use as often as I would like. Very difficult to use without the dropper
customer_reviews.author: lauren jacks

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the oil, I bought it for my hair and nails, and It works great. I only am sad that the cap on the dropper does not fit the bottle, which means I have to remove the dropper and and replace the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha B Hellquist

customer_reviews.title: It smelled like ham
customer_reviews.text: When I got this, I realized it smelled like ham. I don't think jojoba oil is supposed to smell like that. Back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: geth1138

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this scent/moisture
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is authentic Jojoba oil, because I've been buying & using jojoba on a daily basis for years and this is the one and only time I tried this brand (Amazon was out of my usual brand) and this one had a weird scent and wasn't as moisturizing as the brand I normally buy. I did use it mixed into things, but I would not buy it again. I don't want to say it's not authentic, but it seemed OFF to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: This jojoba oil is the real deal. Going on, it feels so very natural. It's lovely to put on my face just after getting out of the shower. My skin drinks it up. I've mixed it with Jason vitamin E oil (45,000) pomegranate oil, evening primrose oil, and black raspberry oil in my simple aloe lotion I make for an all over after-shower body moisturizer. The best jojoba I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: STINKS BAD
customer_reviews.text: I use jojoba oil to clean and put my plugs in my ear (they’re a very small size so it can be tricky). I use a lot of oil. The stuff I normally get in the same price as this but for an ounce. When I got this and opened it I convulsed. It STINKS! I tried to use it on my ear and it did not work. I used my other oil and my plug went right into my ear. The oil also made my skin very hrash to the touch. So, it did not do what I wanted it, it stunk, and my cat tried to eat it. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The picture is misleading - mine did not come with a dropper / pipette so i waste a lot of product and create an oily mess on the counters pouring this into my hand. I guess I could spend more money & buy a tiny funnel & glass dropper bottle & go to the trouble of decanting it or i could go back to using my old brand.
customer_reviews.author: Smudge

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED BROKEN TWICE
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty frustrated to be honest because the price for this oil is reasonable and I was excited to use it. The first time i ordered it the glass dropper that is also included arrived completely broken, so I drove all the way to the UPS store to send it back and I ordered a replacement which just arrived today and the dropper is broken in this package as well! Clearly whoever is in charge of packaging this item is not very smart because glass needs to be protected when it's getting tossed around in the mail! Will be returning and ordering from a different brand, because I want the dropper.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier oil for scents
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a carrier oil for essential oils. Made scented oils for after shower or swimming. It absorbed really well and didn't leave a sticky feeling. It has no strong scent so I didn't have to worry about the essential oil I mixed in. So far, I've made eucalyptus oil and lemon verbena oil. Both are fragrant and moisturizing. I've also mixed the scented oil with body lotion for larger areas, like legs and arms.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lefevre

customer_reviews.title: Use in hand sanitizer and on hair
customer_reviews.text: I use in my hair and in DIY hand sanitizer spray and soap. I think it's great for both and keeps my hands from drying out from the alcohol. I just use one full dropper with a couple drops of fragrance oils in a spray bottle with rubbing alcohol in a 100 ml spray bottle. In my soap I use two full droppers. If you can find 90% rubbing alcohol you could probably use more drops...but I could only find 70%. I just apply straight on my hair before my leave in conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: A must have for DIY facial recipes.
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil every day in the morning and at night. I mix it with pomegranate seed oil and it has made my skin (face) look much younger even after spending weeks in the sun. I highly recommend this Jojoba oil. This is a carrier oil as is pomegranate seed oil but I don't even put essential oils with it because it works so well. What I love the most is how fast my skin absorbs it and it has really slowed down my body's own oil production on my face.
customer_reviews.author: RoxAnn

customer_reviews.title: No more super oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: I was like a lot of people who think using oil on a face that already gets super oily is madness. After the first use my face is way less greasy and my skin no longer has the occasional break-out. I put it on my face after I wash my face in the evening so it does its thing overnight. If you have gross oily skin like I had, trust me, use this. Its seems this is legit 100% oil as it worked correctly. Some people may have a reaction like any other natural or synthetic thing you put on your skin so test a small area on the inside of your arm first
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: A simple clean product
customer_reviews.text: The scent i wasnt sure how to score it for it has no scent. Ive used jojoba oils from other manufacturers before and I dont think this brand is for me to purchase again. All is wonderful about it. Packing, the dropper, its consistency isn't as viscous as i prefer my jojoba oil to be. I am using with zero negative issues just so you know. Its a good product intelligently presented. I am thankful to have it. I wouldn't tell anyone not to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: It is very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: I am diabetic and have neuropathy and venous insufficiency with poor circulation and slow blood flow to my heart. I get open wounds from dry skin that are hard to heal. I have tried many salves and oils and this works the best of anything I have used This is my second bottle and unfortunately I spilled quite of bit of the oil, so I am ordering another bottle. I have a lot of allergic reactions to other products, but this one seems to be pure and it works great for me with compromised skin.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO

customer_reviews.title: Good quality jojoba oil in a glass bottle with glass dropper
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality jojoba oil in a glass bottle with glass dropper. I have found jojoba oil in local health food stores which come in plastic bottles that are cheaper and are about the same cost for 8 oz versus this 4 oz. I think it's a trade off. I don't keep jojoba oil in it's original container usually because I mix my own blends for home use so I think I would prefer to get more that is in a plastic bottle. This does absorb pretty quickly as well. You will notice in some of my pictures that it looked a bit odd but I think it was semi-frozen...once it thawed, it became liquid again.
customer_reviews.author: JCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I was looking for. The only problem I had was in the shipping. When the product arrived to me the glass dropper which is included was broken inside the box. I assume it is due to the packaging of the product which does not allow for proper protection of the glass dropper inside the box. However, I was able to easily contact the seller of the product and they were more than happy to send me a replacement dropper at no extra charge. I received the replacement dropper quickly and with no breakage. I will definitely order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D'Amore

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed product.
customer_reviews.text: My product did not come sealed, at all. People are stating that their product are sealed with plastic. Mine is not. I am VERY skeptical to use this as this is not a common thing for products, let alone oils. The dropper appears to have fingerprints on it, also. I would very much like to use this product, which is why I bought this, however, I would like a properly sealed product. I work in the pharmaceutical industry, and this is a HUGE NO NO.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Fifi

customer_reviews.title: Strengthens hair, stimulates growth. Pure and organic. No skin sensitivity when used
customer_reviews.text: Ive done EXTENSIVE research for hair growth and strengthening. This oil is vegan, organic, pure and does not have a negative impact on my extremely sensitive skin. I appreciate it's purity and I the portion size is excellent for the price. It's good value for the cost. I mix it with rosemary oil( clinically proven go grow hair) and peppermint oil (stimulates growth when massaged on scalp) along with castor oil. This mixture definitely seems to strengthen my hair and i do recommend using this oil as a base. There are no horrible additives and it smells great! Massage in and leave on overnight / wash in AM with organic shampoo for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Nice Oil, Watch The Dropper Assembly
customer_reviews.text: This is a generously sized bottle. There is very little scent that I detected and I have a strong sense of smell. A little goes a long way. Just a few drops on my face and the moisture level is brought back up. My feet love it. So do my hands. The only issue I found so far seems to be a design flaw with the dropper assembly because oil leaks out from underneath the part which screws onto the bottle. I have to wipe oil off of the upper area of the bottle repeatedly after each use. And the leaking continues for several days afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Oil
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! This oil has worked miracles on my nails! I have never had long, healthy nails and just putting this on morning and night has made a huge difference! I actually have to cut them now because they get too long, before they'd just break. They were so paper thin, and would chip apart on any sort of edge that would grow out. I have yet to break a nail in months! I recommend this oil to everyone, and will do so until I can't find it anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This stuff literally saved my skin
customer_reviews.text: This oil is wonderful. I have very sensitive skin and can't use most moisturizers, especially on my face. I applied it to my eyelids after using an anti-inflammatory cream (which never worked by itself), and it totally cleared up the dry, irritated, and flaky patches of skin. I thought my skin would never recover, but this stuff worked miracles. I've also put it lightly on the rest of my face, and it gave my skin a dewy glow without causing breakouts or making it feel like I coated myself with sunscreen. My boyfriend likes to use it as beard oil. It has a slight smell to it, but it's barely noticeable unless you put your nose right in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs quickly and not greasy...
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. Have never used Jojoba oil before. Purchased to compliment essential oils but I use it for overall body moisturizer, including hair...love the scent, it's light and kind of nutty...absorbs into skin quick and not greasy...will purchase again and the larger size next time..as usual Amazon delivered within a couple of days of ordering...love this oil and have shared with friends...Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Timocee

customer_reviews.title: DIY homemaker approved!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it on my arm straight out the bottle. Very light, non oily. Didn't leave a greasy/oily coating on my arm. an extremely faint, almost unnoticeable nutty smell. (As it shouldn't have a strong noticeable smell anyway). You'd have to practically put some in your nose or push your nose up to your skin to recognize it. Needed this for diy personal care products. This company's oils are certified organic, so that's a plus. The non GMO verified project seal is a super plus for me when buying products. I've also bought peppermint essential oil from this company. As of now, this company will be my go to for buying what I need for my diy personal care products
customer_reviews.author: DeeLuv1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for shaving men’s faces!
customer_reviews.text: It has a pretty neutral scent so I made that a lower star. I use it as a shave oil and it works brilliantly! I’ve been buying expensive shaving oils for years at $25+ for 2oz, so $10 for this large amount that works well with my sensitive skin is amazing! I highly recommend it. It’s softens the hair and reduces skin irritation as long as I couple it with an alcohol free shave cream. I also use a shaving brush and a heavier moisturizer with Aragon oil in it as an aftershave. Makes for a smooth, close and irritation free shave!
customer_reviews.author: JoshuaNYC78

customer_reviews.title: Making a difference
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time, but had a broken dropper. I notified the seller and he immediately sent me a new one. I feel as if my skin is already looking smoother after just 2 weeks of using the product. It has no added ingredients. I am very happy with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: karen lynn

customer_reviews.title: Smells like bacon...
customer_reviews.text: Smells like liquid smoke. It’s awful. I literally can’t use this.
customer_reviews.author: Anne OBrien

customer_reviews.title: This oil works really great. I started using it on my face
customer_reviews.text: This oil works really great. I started using it on my face, nails, and hair. I love using this oil on my face because I can't use lotion (I'm allergic), so this oil makes my face look clean. It also helped clear up my acne. This oil has also been helping my nails grow really strong, and my hair as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Gracia

customer_reviews.title: Great oil - terrible dropper
customer_reviews.text: The oil itself is very nice, being smoother and richer than my last brand. The reason I took stars off, is the horrible dropper!!! It comes out in a FAST drip all by itself, so not only is it very hard to control the amount you want, it's also very messy since the drops are coming out constantly and running down the bottle or table or your hand. I like the tinted glass bottle, but I'm thinking I might have to decant it into something else.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nony Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.text: This oil gave me rashes. I have used jojoba oil before, sometimes pure, sometimes mixed with other oils and have never had any issues, but this time I got a rash and eventually hives from using this. It's weird though, because I only got the rash on my neck, not on my face. AND I've had radiation on my neck in the last 6 months, so I'm not totally blaming the oil for the rash, except that when I stopped using it, it went away from my neck. But like I said, it was fine for my face. I don't want to risk the rash though so unfortunately, full bottle to waste.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Dropper came broken
customer_reviews.text: I just received my package and you know first impressions really matter, dropper came broken. I can return it , because it says no return. I noticed previous reviewer's also complained about this same thing. I'm disappointed cos with out the dropper my oil is going to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Praise Iwowari

customer_reviews.title: Love this healing moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this to use as a hair moisturizer, and I absolutely love it for that! BUT... I've started to use it on my ezcema to help moisturize it and to reduce cracking, I'm seriously amazed by how much my skin has improved in just a fee short days of using it! I've already purchased 3 bottles and will definitely purchase more as needed! Edit: removing 1 star because the dropper on the 2nd bottle is completely useless, thankfully I still have the dropper from bottle #1
customer_reviews.author: Stefa La Jefa

customer_reviews.title: Suits my needs
customer_reviews.text: I've read other reviews saying this oil is not authentic Jojoba and/or not good quality. I can't speak to that as I haven't purchased jojoba in years and don't remember what the other was like. I can say that I like this and it absorbs beautifully into my skin with no residue or greasy feel. I did some research and read that jojoba can range in color from yellow to pale straw color, dependent on where it's grown, time of year, etc. What I received is a tad darker than straw color. The scent is (s)light - kinda reminds me of sesame oil but not nearly as strong - and is not offensive. I'm satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real jojoba oil
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this product a year ago and loved it. It smelled great, really nutty. But I recently replaced it with another bottle that smells honestly rancid. Like rotten bacon! I’ve seen other reviews saying similar things. I’m not sure if I want to keep using it because I’m afraid it will burn my skin like others have commented. I don’t think this is real jojoba. And I can’t even return it because I ordered it a month ago before my other one ran out! Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Angel H.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to curly hair care
customer_reviews.text: I heard about jojoba oil, and finally decided to try my first bottle. This is a great product for people with type 3a+ curly hair. My hair is is mixed, has different textures in different spots, but this oil is light enough that it doesn’t make me look greasy, but moisturizing enough to give my ends a nice healthy look and help my more finicky areas. I also have started using a little on my face now that it’s getting a bit cold. Good face moisturizer too, but I use very little, and mix it in with other face moisturizer. All in all, great multi-use oil.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil instead of lotion for my body on the daily. With all this excessive hand washing, my skin was looked like it belonged on a lizard. This has really helped my hands. However, the eyedropper set up it has to get the oil out of the bottle is awful. You have to be very diligent/quick otherwise the oil is dripping all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: cnd13

customer_reviews.title: Ok I think I struck gold 😁
customer_reviews.text: I have used many oils on my 3b (losser drier curl)curly hair like coconut castor olive oil. All of the above were way to heavy for my type of hair. I tried this and yesssss perfection! Soft non greasy curls. I also used as a pre poo before shampoo for my daughter waist length beautiful hair to dentangle before a wash. And it worked magic! My son has some dryness in his scalp and around his nose and it worked on him as well. There is a slight scent but goes away quickly. I love this and so happy I found it! Gold!
customer_reviews.author: Mememe

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd time buying this product - I've been using for 1yr now
customer_reviews.text: I decided I wanted to have a more planet-friendly face routine about a year ago, so I decided to switch to an oil cleansing wash. I use this jojoba oil as the base, along with some castor oil and rosehip oil. I follow it up with an ACV-based toner. It works great! My skin looks healthier than ever. I also use the jojoba oil on a wipe to get off any remnants of eye makeup (mostly mascara) that I don't get on my first wash. I have very sensitive skin and am prone to breakouts, but so far so good using this oil!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and haven’t had any problem. I watched a YouTube video in which is 75-year-old woman who had beautiful skin Had been using only this all of her life so I decided to give it a try. After I wash my face, I put it on and I do feel like my skin is very smooth. I do use a different moisturizer in the morning since this oily but it is my go to at night.
customer_reviews.author: Top10amazonpurchasesjunkie

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful overnight moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night as my overnight moisturizer. It’s deceiving because it initially feels and looks too oily and made me wonder if I’d break out as a result. Nope!! The oil absorbs beautifully overnight and my skin is super-hydrated in the morning without feeling greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Oil leaked All Over
customer_reviews.text: Arrived leaking and opened. I will not use it since the seal was broken. I’m requesting a return or refund. Highly dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chanthy Conger

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I use it on my face multiple times a day and as an add in for moisturizing products. It works super well for both. Jojoba oil is great for moisturizing the skin as it is able to penetrate deep. I put it on and it quickly absorbs leaving no trace of oiliness at all. My blemishes have improved significantly since starting to use this as my daily moisturizer also. It has a very light nutty scent that is hardly noticeable at first, and completely gone once applied to the skin. An added bonus... it’s certified organic!
customer_reviews.author: James Duckery

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have really dry, sensitive skin and used to combine this with a few other oils in a custom blend made just for my skin. But recently I've been lazy and have just been using this to replace my moisturizer at night. Since I switched to using this (plus tea tree oil as a spot treatment), my breakouts have improved a lot. My skin feels moisturized and soft, although I'm sure come winter I'll need an additional moisturizer. Jojoba is so good for the skin and this product is a really good quality, especially for the price. I highly recommend giving it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love This Oil
customer_reviews.text: This product has greatly improved my skin. I went though a tough time of removing ingrown hairs. Later, I experienced aged, dry looking skin until I read the miracles of jojoba oil and ordered it on Amazon. This organic 100% pure oil worked wonders, and is still improving the appearance of my fine lines. It is worth every penny and it feels so good on when you apply it. It is non-greasy, and the dropper makes it easy to add some drops to your facial creams or liquid makeup. A wonderful product that can be applied to every part of your body. I always want to have this product on hand. It really works!!
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Save$$

customer_reviews.title: Allergic
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of this oil but sadly broke out in a very itchy, scaly rash all over my neck and chest. I wasn't sure of the cause initially, so I eliminated several items and this was the last one I added back into my routine after not using it for about 3 weeks. I just started using it again yesterday and this morning and already my neck is very itchy.
customer_reviews.author: AILEEN

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy! Breaking out and red skin
customer_reviews.text: This oil has been Causing me to break out, which never happens. I woke up with very red every morning after applying at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Er mer gersh - win win right here!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had sensitive skin and on top of that have to be careful with scents. And then when I finally foun something, it's all sticky or doesn't show any results. NOT THIS PRODUCT!! It's five stars all the way in my book. Soaks in fast, minimal (if any) fragrance, and really leaves skin glowing over time! And all natural! Win win. I'm really impressed. I'm actually about to order my second bottle soon.
customer_reviews.author: KIsaDuds

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction Lasting 2 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my nails, to prevent hang nails. It was working great! So then I tried it on my dry knees and elbows - also worked like a charm. Then I tried it on my neck, arms, and legs. Big mistake. I developed a rash that is so deep set in my skin, that I have had to douse my skin in aloe for 2 weeks! Turns out this product must have something I'm allergic to (I hadn't changed anything else in my beauty routine). Please be wary and careful with using this!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Live Without!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beneficial and most needed beauty item. I have gone without it at times and have dramatically noticed a lifelessness and dullness to my skin. It blends into your skin effortlessly and any “greasy” or “oily” feeling is absorbed very quickly leaving just a beautiful glow. It is a must have , no expensive product preaching this or that has ever come close to what jojoba oil does for my skin. I use it for my hair as well at times. I loveeee this product.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Fieri

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising- Not Pure, Processed Instead
customer_reviews.text: It's processed. This is too clear; it should be a bright, golden color in its purest form just like the brand I had before buying this stupid 1. So, I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Sooo good for oily and  acne prone skin !!!
customer_reviews.text: I dont normal write reviews but for this oil i have to . Omg after using it for a few months my face is acne free . 100% cleared my acne . I use it instead of a moisturizer at night and my skin feels nice and soft it absorbs very fast without leaving an oily feeling . I always have trouble with moisturizers they make my skin too oily and I break out but I also want to hydrate and moisturize my skin . This is the perfect solution to moisturize without breaking out . I love this oil and brand so much that now I want to try their argan and rosehip oil as well .
customer_reviews.author: Newmom23

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great to Mix with Argan oil for Beards
customer_reviews.text: Update: 4 months later I still am pleased, and the bottle is only half empty. Beard oils are stupid expensive. Buy this and an equal size of Argan oil, mix them equally, and you have a terrific beard oil for 1/4 the price or less. I especially like that it is unscented. When I rub about a nickel sized bit of the oils in my beard it looks and feels great, and I don't mind doing it twice a day or more since it is so cheap when you mix your own oils. I mixed this with this Argan oil:
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: ... closest to human skin oil and it feels so good to put it on
customer_reviews.text: Jojoba oil is supposed to be the closest to human skin oil and it feels so good to put it on! It absorbs well and makes a world of difference on the dry spots by my eyes, my elbows and everything else too! It arrived on time and in very good packaging. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: lou

customer_reviews.title: LOVE as a daily cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I got Jojoba Oil after having a facial and the beautician recommended it as a oil-based cleanser for me given my acne-prone skin and that I wear a full face of MAC make-up everyday--that stuff can be hard to fully get off!! But this breaks all that gunk DOWN to smithereens. I am grateful to my facial lady for recommending, as I literally had never heard of the dang thing before. Highly recommended for full-face make-up wearers looking for a kick-butt cleanser that both takes the day/night off while moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan Waring

customer_reviews.title: Odor is horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. I personally use it for my face and leaves my skin super soft and absorbs wonderfully. 🙌🏼 I use it for my hair and nails and works wonders, recently order s second bottle since I am almost done with the first one which I bought last year so it really last long!! Update—-09/22/19 Oil from new bottle smells super strong like an old oil the color is different too. Smh! I got a rash from it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: YUP it's a 5 star  and more !!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some views/ratings this gets 5 stars, its packaging, with dropper, no rancid sent, no sent at all really, it's as close to a skin identical oil as u will ever get. Patch tested on my jawline near my ear, 100% non irritating, its 4oz at an amazing price u cant beat, as a professional Esthetician/skin Care educator it's a must have formulation, I love this product, how quickly Amazon prime delivered, and the date on my bottle on NOT expired..
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a broken top and pipet and no ability to return or refund.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Packing from Amazon prime sucks
customer_reviews.text: I open the Amazon prime bag. And i find out that it was open and the dropper was broken. The container was dripping.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth castanon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I took off one star because it seems like everyone except for me got a dropper with their oil ? Very strange. I added tea tree oil to my oil and I like this almost as much as I like rosehip oil. I use this both on my hair and skin and I have sensitive skin but this product did not cause irritation or breakouts for me. The scent is neutral to me I can’t smell anything so this is ideal for me in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin☺️
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this. Moisturizing for sure. I have a red tint to my face get easily flushed have moderate roseaca. I apply at night to my redness and wake up with my natural skin tone. I highly recommend if you have skin like mine. Ive been using jojoba oil for 2 years. I tried this one because the one I was using..I went to use after maybe 2 months and it smelled so foul. I don’t know the shelf life of this one..However what I’m using it for has reaped rewards for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I want to try a natural moisturizer to my face, but I wasn't sure because I dont like the idea of having oil in my face. But works perfectly, and after minutes the face absorb the oil and your face does not look oily at all. After a couple of days I stop using my face cream, and my face in a week looks, better. On top of that it helps with acne and does not have chemical at all. I love it. Inside has a coupon for a lemon grass free oil, and they already send it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Does not clog pores and makes your skin so soft!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not crazy about the sand but I feel like this leave my face really soft and I don’t get any breakouts. This Maybe because her whole body oil does not clog pores! However, I wouldn’t recommend this without a moisturizer. I washed my face then I add this to damp skin and then I throw over a moisturizer. Overall, I really love this oil, but it does have an odd smell. Nothing too crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Love this Brand
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a set of the Top Eight Essential oils and have used them in my diffuser daily . The fragrances are very pure and true to scent. I read recipes in the booklet that came with that set & decided to try the DYI face serum. I bought the Jojoba oil and am very pleased with the serum. I use it at night as a moisturizer. A little goes a long way, and no added chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: chongo

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to existing skincare routine
customer_reviews.text: I use 1-2 drops with my body lotion for each body section. I use this on my arms, elbows, legs and stomach. If I didn’t use a lot of skincare at night then I will add a drop and tap around my forehead, outside the eyes and around mouth to help prevent future wrinkles. It doesn’t have a noticeable scent and I have nose sensitivities (allergies). I also have eczema and I didn’t have any reaction to this. Great added moisture!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Yu

customer_reviews.title: Organic Jojoba Oil is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I started using my Jojoba oil as soon as I received it. My skin is very dehydrated after many surgeries (plus age) and after using it just a few times, my skin looks and feels much healthier. I'm starting to experiment more with the oil i.e. adding it to different lotions for my body as well as using it on my face. I'm also going to use it as a 'mask' for my hair. So many uses! It's not too oily and sinks into my skin nicely. So far, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: san50

customer_reviews.title: Broken eyedropper shipped with Jojoba Oil!!
customer_reviews.text: My Jojoba Oil was received tonight. Upon opening the box, I found a dropper with 1" of broken glass in it with no other glass in the package. Strange that the broken dropper would ship with no other glass in that package. Very disappointed. Now what am I going to use??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great absorption
customer_reviews.text: This my first time using Jojoba oil & first time buying this brand. The bottle arrived sealed with the glass eye dropper in a separate package. To me the smell was light & pleasant. I applied it all over before bedtime just in case it took awhile to absorb but was pleasantly surprised I was able to quickly hop in bed without feeling oily. I have very sensitive dry skin & overall very pleased with is oil. I will definitely purchase the larger bottle next time. In the package was also a free offer for one of their essential oils so I look forward to trying that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lucey

product_meta.title: Cliganic USDA Organic Jojoba Oil, 100% Pure (4oz Large) | Natural Cold Pressed Unrefined Hexane Free Oil for Hair & Face | Base Carrier Oil | Cliganic 90 Days Warranty
feature_bullets: CERTIFIED ORGANIC JOJOBA OIL by USDA - the strict oversight of USDA ensures the integrity of our Organic Cold Pressed Jojoba Oil. In other words, it’s really 100% ORGANIC.
100% PURE, ONLY ONE INGREDIENT - Our Premium Jojoba Oil Organic is 100% Pure & Natural – No Additives, No Alcohol, No Added-Fragrance and Not Diluted (Jojoba Plant: Simmondsia Chinensis).

CLIGANIC 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - RISK FREE! We put a lot of effort into manufacturing quality products that will meet our customers' expectations. And we stand behind every item that we make, 100%. If you are not satisfied completely with your purchase, we will be happy to replace it or issue you a full refund.

MULTIPURPOSE OIL, BEST BENEFITS – Best Jojoba Oil for Face, Hair & Body. The Jojoba Carrier Oil has remarkable effects on the skin, scalp, beard and hair, and It can be used for all skin types. Light-weight, Unrefined and fast absorbing, it’s gentle enough to be used on even the most sensitive skin.

PREMIUM BRAND, BOTTLED IN THE USA – Cliganic Organic Unrefined Jojoba Oil is bottled in the USA with the highest standards. Our production process takes the dessert essence, giving you premium 100% pure organic oil. It is NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS now with the Cruelty Free Certification.
